Organization.description:
An Organization groups multiple Users together. The Users, within
the Organization, can share the Computations together and collaborate
together on their development.

A User can be a member of the multiple Organizations. Each User has
a role withing the Organization that determines the level of permissions
to read and manipulate resources in the Organization.
Organization.title: Organization

Sign-in Request.description: Request body to sign in the User
Sign-in Request.title: Sign-in Request

Evaluator.description:
An Evaluator is the concrete implementation of a Formula evaluator that
is capable of reading the definition of the Formula and evaluating it.

The Evaluators can be created and manipulated only by the administrators.
Other types of users can, however, read and list them.

module.description: Name of the module that is implementing this Evaluator

Evaluator.title: Evaluator

Computation.description:
A Computation groups multiple Formulas, Inputs, and Outputs together
in a form of a container. This resource can be compared to a spreadsheet
in the conventional office programs.

creator_id.description: ID of the user who created the Computation

Computation.title: Computation

Organization Response.description: Response body for a single Organization
Organization Response.title: Organization Response

Roles Response.description: Response body for the multiple Roles
Roles Response.title: Roles Response

Sign-in Response.description: Response after signing in the User
Sign-in Response.title: Sign-in Response

Formula.description:
A Formula represents an expression that that can be used inside the
particular Computation. The syntax, behavior, and capability of the
Formula definition depends on the linked Evaluator.

definition.description: Definition of the Formula in the syntax supported by the linked Evaluator

evaluator_id.description: ID of the Evaluator used to evaluate the definition of the Formula

label.description: Unique label of the Formula within the Computation that is used as a variable reference

Formula.title: Formula

Output Response.description: Response body for a single Output
Output Response.title: Output Response

Computations Response.description: Response body for the multiple Computations
Computations Response.title: Computations Response

Evaluator Response.description: Response body for a single Evaluator
Evaluator Response.title: Evaluator Response

Formula Evaluation Response.description: Response body of the successful Formula evaluation

result.description: Value of the result in the JSON format

Formula Evaluation Response.title: Formula Evaluation Response

Output.description:
An Output holds the result of the evaluation of the particular
Formula. The value of the Output is always validated against the
linked FieldSchema.

field_schema_id.description: ID of the FieldSchema used to validate the last_value

formula_id.description: ID of the Formula that yields the result of the evaluation

label.description: Unique label of the Output within the Computation that is used as a variable reference

last_value.description: The most recent value of the Output that is valided against the linked FieldSchema

Output.title: Output

User.description:
A User represents a concrete user/account within the application.
Most of the endpoints require authenticated User in order to work
with them.
User.title: User

Evaluators Response.description: Response body for the multiple Evaluators
Evaluators Response.title: Evaluators Response

Computation Response.description: Response body for a single Computation
Computation Response.title: Computation Response

FieldSchema.description:
A FieldSchema is any JSON schema that can be used to validate a value
of the Input or Output against.

definition.description: Valid JSON schema for the validation

FieldSchema.title: FieldSchema

Input.description:
An Input holds the input data provided by the client. The value of
the Input is always validated against the linked FieldSchema. The
Input can be seen as a variable which can hold data of the type
determined by the linked FieldSchema.

field_schema_id.description: ID of the FieldSchema used to validate the last_value

label.description: Unique label of the Input within the Computation that is used as a variable reference

last_value.description: The most recent value of the Input that is valided against the linked FieldSchema

Input.title: Input

Outputs Response.description: Response body for the multiple Outputs
Outputs Response.title: Outputs Response

Role.description:
The Roles are used within the Organization to determine what a
User is able to do with the resources in the Organization.

There are currently these Roles available:

* owner
* maintainer
* regular
Role.title: Role

Users Response.description: Response body for the multiple Users
Users Response.title: Users Response

info.description: REST API for the Adaptable Costs Evaluator application.
info.title: Adaptable Costs Evaluator

get.summary: List all Formulas in the Computation

post.summary: Create a new Formula in the Computation

delete.summary: Delete the Formula in the Computation

get.summary: Retrieve the Formula from the Computation

patch.summary: Update the Formula in the Computation

put.summary: Update the Formula in the Computation

post.description:
Runs the evaluation of the Formula and returns the result of the evaluation.
It also returns the list of affected Outputs. An affected Output is an
Output where the evaluation wrote the result to the `last_value` attribute.

If the given Output was not affected (even though the `formula_id` is set),
it means that the validation of the result value against the linked FieldSchema
failed.
post.summary: Run the evaluation of the Formula
